inclusion.criterion: Childhood ALL in first relapse OR in first hematological relapse after an extramedullary relapse, OR not attaining a complete remission with frontline therapies, OR lymphoblastic leukemia in first relapse.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must be 21 years of age or younger
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Informed consent explained to and signed by parent/legal guardian.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with mature B cell ALL
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of recurrent C diff infections and was recently treated for an extended course of 6 weeks. She also had leukocytosis consistent with C diff.
